name: 梁斯寧
objective: This course aims to introduce to students the basic concepts, issues and skills of corpus linguistics, including types of corpora, corpus design and construction, corpus analytical tools and techniques, and methodologies for corpus-based studies. It will discuss the major uses of corpora and the applications of corpus linguistics in English language teaching and learning. In the class, students will read and discuss previous studies, and will be given hands-on activities to use corpora and corpus tools.
schedule:

Week 2: Corpora, corpus tools and corpus analytical techniques
Week 3: Workshop: corpus tools (I)
Week 4: Data-Driven Learning
Week 5: Extended units of meaning
Week 6: In-class quiz 1
Week 7: Workshop: corpus tools (II)
Week 8: Approaches to corpus studies
Week 9: Mid-term assessment
Week 10: EAP
Week 11: Workshop: corpus tools (III)
Week 12: Project consultation
Week 13: In-class quiz 2
Week 14: ESP: Guest speaker seminar
Week 15: Learner corpora
Week 16: Oral presentation
Week 17: Oral presentation
Week 18: Final project
